JobPositionInformation.PositionTitle: Danish Speaking Loan Administration Specialists, Birkirkara, Malta (369914)
JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
Job description

We seek to provide innovative financial products that are easily accessible to all. Striving to be transparent and honest in all its products and responsible in the way it operates to ensure safety. The company mainly offers Micro lending using Cash per and Pre-paid Cards both consumer and corporate and gift cards.

The Loan Administration Specialist is responsible for handling all customer enquiries in a client driven environment regarding payments, customer billing problems, outstanding amounts, and different debt repayment options in compliance with the Company’s policies, procedures and related laws and regulations.

Minimum Secondary education, Experience as a debt collector is a plus but not compulsory. Must have experience in a call centre environment or worked in customer care before. Have the skills to Negotiate with common sense logic when collecting debts, confidence, and empathy with the clients.

Benefits:

  • Bonus 10% of salary extra every quarter based on performance
  • Health and life insurance after 6-months’ probation

Training provided

Yes

Any assistance with accommodation/relocation

Yes – more information to be discussed during the interview.

Salary

€23,000 - €24,000 / year

How will the interviews be held?

Online

To apply

CV and a covering email are to be sent by email to eures.recruitment.jobsplus@gov.mt and should be written in English. Please quote the vacancy name and number 369914 in your email.

Latest application date is 11.05.2022.

(from EURES Malta)

 

EURES står for European Employment Service og er et tilbud til alle EU-borgere, der ønsker at arbejde i et andet EU/EØS-land. Her finder du job i udlandet og information om jobsøgning i udlandet.

http://www.europa.eu/eures 

Følg os på Facebook "EURES Danmark"
